come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:56.source: TONY...TONY. DON'T LEAVE ME LIKE THIS! PLEASE DON'T LEAVE ME!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:56.target: 托尼…托尼。别这样离开我！请不要离开我！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:51.source: IT DOESN'T MATTER TONY! WHAT ABOUT yOU? WHATS THE MATTER? YOU DON'T SEEM THE SAME!
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:51.target: 没关系，托尼！你呢？怎么了？你看起来不一样了！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:50.source: MY FEELINGS FOR HIM WERE THE SAME, BUT I DIDN'T WANT IT TO BE LIKE THIS!
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:50.target: 我对他的感情并没有变，但我不想这样！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:50.source: I WISH COULD TAKE YOU TO A BETTER PLACE, BUT...
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:50.target: 我希望能带你去一个更好的地方，但是……

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:55.source: ALL RIGHT BABY BUT PLEASE COME OUTSIDE FOR A MINUTE!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:55.target: 好的，宝贝，但请到外面来一分钟！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:55.source: ME OLD TONY NEVER CHANGES, BABy! C'MON, LET'S FEED SOME NICKELS INTO THE JUKE BOX! WE HAVEN'T DANCED IN YEARS!
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:55.target: 我，老托尼从不改变，宝贝！来，我们给点唱机加点硬币！我们好几年没跳舞了！

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:53.source: DONIT WORRY MISS CONNOLLY! SHE'S DOING MORE GOOD FOR THE BOy THAN I COULD DO IN THE NEXT SIX MONTHS! LETS GO!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:53.target: 别担心康诺利小姐！在接下来的六个月里，她能为他做的事情比我能做的还多！我们走！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:54.source: YOU DON'T REALLY WANT TO STAY HERE, DO yOU, BABy?. THIS IS A BIG NIGHT... THERE WON'T EVER BE ANOTHER LIKE IT! COME WITH ME
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:54.target: 你不是真的想留在这里吧，宝贝？这是个重要的夜晚.。再也不会有这样的夜晚了！跟我走？

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:58.source: BUT..ALL RIGHT, TONY...FOR A LITTLE WHILE.
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:58.target: 但是，好吧，托尼，就一会儿。

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:0.source: TONY LEFT, AND ONCE AGAIN HE VANISHED FROM MY LIFE. ONCE IN A WHILE I WOULD HEAR ABOUT HIM... THAT HE WAS RUNNING WITH A FAST CROWD...BUT NOTHING DEFINITE. ANOTHER YEAR PASSED, AND THEN ANOTHER, THEN, DURING THE CHRISTMAS VACATION BEFORE BRAD'S GRADUATION, HE ASKED ME. I'LL NEVER FORGET THAT NIGHT-IT WAS CHRISTMAS EVE.
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:0.target: 托尼离开了，他又一次从我的生活中消失了。我偶尔能听到他的消息，他和一群花天酒地的人在一起，但消息并不确切。又过了一年，在巴特毕业前的圣诞节假期，他向我求婚了。我永远不会忘记那晚，那是平安夜。

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:1.source: I'VE BEEN OFFERED A GOOD JOB, EILEEN, STARTING RIGHT AFTER GRADUATION! I'LL HAVE SOMETHING TO OFFER YOU THEN, DARLING! WILL yOU... WILL YOU MARRY ME? MARRy YOU? A
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:1.target: 我得到了一份好工作，艾琳，毕业后我就去上班了！我也能支持你了，亲爱的！你愿意，你愿意嫁给我吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:8.source: YOU'RE BEAUTIFUL, EILEEN...YOU'RE THE MOST BEAUTIFUL GIRL I'VE EVER KNOWN!
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:8.target: 你真漂亮，艾琳…你是我认识的最漂亮的女孩！

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:9.source: OH, TONY... YOU TALK SO SILLY!

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:50.source: DO YOU THINK SAFE IN HIS CONDITION, DOCTOR?
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:50.target: 医生，你认为他的情况安全吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:50.source: IF YOU LOVED ME , YOU'D BELIEVE IN ME ! YOU WOULDN'T NEED TO KNOW ANy THING BUT THAT I LOVE YOU
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:50.target: 如果你爱我，你就会相信我！你不需要知道任何事情，只需要知道我爱你！

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:45.source: yOU'RE WRONG, HONEY- I'VE ALWAYS LOVED YOU! WILL yOU... WILL YOU MARRY ME, EILEEN?
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:45.target: 你错了，亲爱的，我一直爱着你！你，你愿意嫁给我吗，艾琳？

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:62.source: I KNEW WHY HE WANTED ME TO COME OUT. SIDE, AND HE KNEW I KNEWI
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:62.target: 我知道他为什么要我出来，他也知道我知道

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:44.source: DON'T WORRY ABOUT OLD TONY, BABy...I CAN TAKE CARE OF MYSELF! LETS TALK ABOUT YOU... yOU LOOK LIKE A MILLION BUCKS!
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:44.target: 别担心老托尼，宝贝，我能照顾好自己！让我们谈谈你.。你看起来像一百万美元！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:45.source: IVE MISSED, BABY! GIMME A LITTLE KISS.. FOR OL' TIMES'SAKE-HOW ABOUT IT?
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:45.target: 我想你了，宝贝！给我一个小小的吻，念在过去的时光，怎么样？

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:42.source: I WANTED TO BELIEVE HIM. I WANTED TO BELIEVE HE REALLY LOVED BUT COULDN'T THROW AWAY MY LIFE IN A SINGLE NIGHT. UNLESS I WAS SURE!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:42.target: 我想相信他，我想相信他真的爱过我。但我不能在一夜之间就抛弃我的生活，除非我确定！

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:42.source: DONT TALK,TONY! WE/VE PLENTY OF TIME FOR TALK... ALL OUR LIVES!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:42.target: 别说话，托尼！我们有足够的时间，我们的一生！

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:6.source: I'M SORRY BUT I CANT ASK YOU IN, TONY! MOM'S ASLEEP!
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:6.target: 对不起，托尼，我不能请你进去！我妈妈睡着了！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:48.source: DON'T, TONY! PLEASE! I MEAN IT!

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:7.source: IT'S A BEAUTIFUL NIGHT... COME UP ON THE ROOF! PLEASE!
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:7.target: 夜晚如此美丽，我们到屋顶上去！好吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:4.source: I HAD KNOWN THEM BOTH SINCE CHILDHOOD BUT IT WASN'T UNTIL THE SPRING WHEN WE GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL THAT THEIR RIVALRY BEGAN TO BE SERIOUS
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:4.target: 我从小就认识他们俩，但直到我们高中毕业那年春天，他们的竞争才开始严肃起来。

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:5.source: I HESITATED A MINUTE, BUT I KNEW I WOULD GO.. AND I GUESS TONY KNEW IT TOO.
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:5.target: 我犹豫了一下，但我知道我会去的。我想托尼也知道。

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:2.source: OH, TONY! TONY! WHAT HAVE YOU DONE？

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:48.source: HOW CAN I, TONY? I DON'T KNOW yOU ANY MORE! I DON'T KNOW WHAT yOU'VE BEEN DOING!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:48.target: 我怎么能接受呢，托尼？我快不认识你了，我也不知道你在做什么！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:9.source: I WAS GRATEFUL FOR WHAT HE SAID, AND FOR THE WAY HE SAID IT. WONDERED IF I LOVED HIM.. I WANTED TO LOVE HIM, BUT.....
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:9.target: 我很感激他说的话还有他说话的方式。我不知道我是否爱他，我想爱他，但是……

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:3.source: ALMOST EVER SINCE I CAN REMEMBER, THERE HAVE BEEN TONY MARKEL AND BART PRENTICE... THE CHOICE I HAD TO MAKE WAS OLD ONE- BETWEEN DEVOTION AND SECURITY ON ONE HAND AND A WILD UNTAMED LOVE ON THE OTHER. I TRIED TO DECIDE WITH MY MIND, BUT MY HEART KEPT GETTING IN THE WAY. I LOVED THEM BOTH, BUT I KNEW I HAD TO DECIDE BEFORE MY CHOICE WAS MADE FOR MEI
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:3.target: 几乎从我记事起，我、托尼·马克尔和巴特·普伦蒂斯就彼此认识了。我需要做出选择：一方面是忠诚和安全，另一方面是狂野不羁的爱。我试着自己做出决定，但我的内心一直摇摆不定。我爱他们两个，但我知道在我被做选择之前我必须做出决定。

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:0.source: YOU CAN STAY FOR A FEW MINUTES, MISS CRANDALL!
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:0.target: 你可以待几分钟，克兰德尔小姐！

come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:1.source: EILEEN! WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE? I DIDN'T WANT YOU TO SEE ME LIKE THIS!
come_to_me_love.itp:2.jpg:1.target: 艾琳！你在这里做什么？我不想让你看到我这个样子！

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:2.source: THE OTHER MAN STARTED TO SHOOT THE WATCHMAN. BUT TONY STOPPED HIM, AND GOT SHOT FOR HIS TROUBLE! HIS BUDDY GOT PANICKY AND RAN...THE WATCHMAN CALLED US! I THINK WE CAN GET TONY OFF WITH A SUSPENDED SENTENCE!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:2.target:
另一个人开始朝警卫开枪。托尼
     拦住了他，但也被枪击中了！
         他的伙伴惊慌失措地跑了。
                   警卫打电话给我们。
                       我想我们可以
                        帮托尼缓刑！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:36.source: EILEEN ! HOW DID… HOW DID YOU KNOW?

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:73.source: MARRY YOU? OH, BRAD...I DON'T KNOW...

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:31.source: OH, DARLIN&, 1 LOVE you: I LOVE you'.
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:31.target: 哦，亲爱的，我爱你！我爱你！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:32.source: I'M NOT YOUR GIRL, TONY! JUST BECAUSE I LET YOU KISS ME DOESN'T MEAN yOU CAN START GIVING ME ORDERS!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:32.target: 我不属于你，托尼！我让你吻我并不意味着你可以命令我！

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:38.source: ITS THE MOONLIGHT TONY! THE MOON- LIGHT AND MEMORIES-THEY PLAY TRICKS ON US!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:38.target: 是月光，托尼！月光和记忆，他们在捉弄我们！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:38.source: YOU'VE BEEN CALLING FOR ME, TONY! WHAT HAPPENED?
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:38.target: 你一直在喊我，托尼！发生什么了？

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:9.source: WE HAVE ORDERS TO TAKE yOU TO THE HOSPITAL! A MR. TONY MARKEL'S BEEN HURT AND HE'S ASKIN' FOR yOU!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:9.target: 我们奉命送你去医院！托尼·马克尔先生受伤了，他一直在喊你！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:3.source: YES, BART...I'VE THOUGHT ABOUT IT A LOT... BUT I STILL DON'T KNOW!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:3.target: 我想了很久，巴特，但我还是不知道！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:6.source: yOU'D COME TO LOVE ME, DARLING! I KNOW YOU WOULD!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:6.target: 你会爱上我的，亲爱的！我知道你会的！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:47.source: I THINK YOU SHOULD KNOW, MISS CRANDALL! IT HAPPENED LIKE THIS! MARKEL AND ANOTHER MAN WERE ROBBING A DEPARTMENT STORE, WHEN THE NIGHT WATCHMAN SPOTTED THEM!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:47.target: 我想你应该知道，克兰德尔小姐！事情是这样的，马克尔和另一个人在一家百货商店偷窃时被警卫发现了！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:60.source: I MEAN IT, TONY! TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME!
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:60.target: 我说真的，托尼！把你的手拿开！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:43.source: I...I CAN'T TELL ! PLEASE HONEY, CAN'T! SHOULDN/T HAVE COME...I DON'T WANT LIKE THIS!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:43.target: 我，我不能说！你不应该来的，亲爱的！我不想这样见你！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:0.source: BUT HE WAS GONE. THE WEEKS DRAGGED BY, AND THEN BART WAS HOME.
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:0.target: 他走了。几个星期过去了，巴特回家了。

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:1.source: HAVE yOU THOUGHT ABOUT... WHAT I ASKED?
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:1.target: 你有没有想过……我问你的事情？

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:26.source: LOTS OF THINGS HAVE CHANGED, TONY! YOU'RE DIFFERENT...I'M DIFFERENT... EVERYTHING'S PIFFERENT!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:26.target: 很多事情都变了，托尼！你变了，我变了，一切都变了！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:49.source: WHEN TONY HELD ME CLOSE, AND SMILED HIS WARM WIDE SMILE, IT WAS ALL I COULD DO TO REFUSE HIM,..
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:49.target: 当托尼紧紧地抱着我，露出他温暖的笑容时，我唯一能做的就是拒绝他…

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:1.source: IT'S SPRING AGAIN, EILEEN! COME UP ON THE ROOF... OUR ROOF!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:1.target: 春天又到了，艾琳！到屋顶上去，我们的屋顶！

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:0.source: HE TRIED TO BE THE OLD CAREFREE TONY, BUT HE DIDNT FOOL ME I ASKED HIM ABOUT HIMSELF, BUT HE WOULDN'T TALK LATER.
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:0.target: 他试着做过去那个无忧无虑的老托尼，但他没能骗过我。我问他，但他不肯说，后来……

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:11.target: 但我确实和他上了屋顶

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:12.source: DOES THAT MEAN yOU'RE GOING TO MARRY BART?
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:12.target: 这是不是意味着你要嫁给巴特？

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:15.source: PARDON ME, BUT ARE MISS EILEEN CRANDALL?
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:15.target: 对不起，艾琳·克兰德尔小姐是吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:13.source: IT WAS THE FIRST TIME, BABy...I...I WANTED TO BUy THINGS FOR yOU! I WANTED TO BE ABLE TO OFFER YOU AS MUCH AS BART!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:13.target: 这是第一次，宝贝，我想给你买东西！我想给你像巴特给的一样多的东西！

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:14.source: I DON'T KNOW, TONY! HE WANTS ME!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:14.target: 我不知道，托尼！他想要我！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:13.source: NOTHING HAD BEEN DECIDED WHEN BRAD WENT BACK TO SCHOOL THEN, LATE THAT MAY, I RAN INTO TONY MARKEL.
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:13.target: 当巴特回到学校的时候，什么都没有定下来。然后，那年五月下旬，我遇到了托尼·马克尔。

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:0.source:
MAYBE HE DID LOVE ME. I KNOW HE MEANT IT THEN, BUT TONY'S KIND
ALWAYS MEAN IT FOR A LITTLE WHILE
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:0.target: 也许他真的爱我，但他似乎只是爱我一会儿

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:11.source: IS HE HURT BADLY? IS HE IN TROUBLE? CAN'T YOU TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED?
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:11.target: 他伤得重吗？他有麻烦了吗？你能不能告诉我发生了什么事？

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:1.source: I'M GOING BE SO PROUD, BABY! YOU'LL BE THE PRETTIEST GIRL AT THE SENIOR PROM!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:1.target: 宝贝，你会是毕业舞会上最漂亮的女孩！我会感到非常骄傲。

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:2.source: I'M NOT GOING WITH YOU, TONy- yOU KNOW THAT! BART ASKED ME WEEKS AGO!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:2.target: 我不是和你去，托尼，你知道的！巴特几周前已经邀请我了。

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:10.source: yOU DON'T HAVE TO TELL NOW, HONEY! THERES A LOT OF TIME... ALL THE TIME IN THE WORLD!
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:10.target: 你不用现在告诉我，亲爱的！我们有很多时间，世界上所有的时间！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:12.source: I DON'T CARE WHAT YOU'VE TOLD BART! YOU'RE MY GIRL AND YOU'RE GOING WITH ME!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:12.target: 我不管你跟巴特是怎么说的！你是我的女友，你是和我一起去！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:15.source: YOU'RE THE MOST BEAUTIFUL GIRL HERE, EILEEN! I SWEAR YOU ARE!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:15.target: 你是这里最漂亮的女孩，艾琳！我发誓你是！

come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:9.source: NOTHING SEEMS CHANGED HONEY! IT'S JUST LIKE IT WAS THAT NIGHT, EXCEPT FOR THE MOON...IT WAS FULL THEN!
come_to_me_love.itp:6.jpg:9.target: 什么都没变亲爱的！就像那天晚上一样，除了月亮…那时是满月！

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:14.source: SUDDENLY, ALL THE FIGHT SEEMED TO GO OUT OF HIM, AND HE TURNED QUICKLY AND LEFT. I DIDN'T SEE HIM AGAIN UNTIL THE NIGHT OF THE PROM.....
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:14.target: 突然，他停止了争吵，迅速转身离开了。直到毕业舞会的那晚，我才再见到他……

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:18.source: I'M SORRY MISS, BUT WE DON'T KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT IT!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:18.target: 对不起，女士，但我们对此一无所知！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:18.source: SORRY BART! I SHOULDN'T HAVE DONE THIS! I...I'D LIKE TO COME BACK... IF IT'S ALL RIGHT...
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:18.target: 对不起，巴特！我不该这么做的！我会回来的，可以吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:26.source: WE ARRIVED, AND THEY TOLD ME HE WAS IN THE OPERATING ROOM. HOURS DRAGGED BY, AND THEN...
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:26.target: 我们到了，他们告诉我他在手术室。几个小时过去了，然后……

come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:27.source: MIND IF I CUT IN, BART? THIS GIRL'S TOO PRETTY TO KEEP ALL TO YOURSELF!
come_to_me_love.itp:3.jpg:27.target: 我打扰下不介意吧，巴特？这位女孩太漂亮了，你不能独自占有！

come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:28.source: THE OPERATIONS OVER, MISS CRANDALL! HE'S WEAK, BUT HE SHOULD PULL THROUGH · ALL RIGHT.!yOU CAN GO IN NOW!
come_to_me_love.itp:7.jpg:28.target: 手术结束了，克兰德尔小姐！他很虚弱，但他会挺过来的。你现在可以进去了！

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:41.source: I'VE LOVED yOU FOR SO LONG, BUT I NEVER THOUGHT I HAD A CHANCE! IVE TRIED TO FORGET yOU... FOR FOUR YEARS, IVE TRIED, BUT IT WASNT ANY USE!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:41.target: 我爱你这么久了，但我从没想过我有机会！我试图忘记你…四年了，我试过了，但没用！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:0.source: FOR ONE WILD ECSTATIC I WOULD HAVE GONE ANYWHERE WITH HIM……
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:0.target: 有那么一个狂喜的瞬间，我愿意和他去任何地方……

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:3.source: GET AWAY FROM HER ! TONY! SHE'S WITH ME！
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:3.target: 离她远点！托尼！她和我在一起！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:7.source: yOU'RE NOT HIS GIRL, EILEEN! TELL HIM!
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:7.target: 你不是他的女友，艾琳！告诉他！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:31.source: I...ALL RIGHT, EILEEN! IT'S ALL RIGHT!

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:31.source: yOU DON'T HAVE TO EXPLAIN! I GUESS I ALWAYS KNEW THIS WOULD HAPPEN SOMEDAY... GOOD-By, EILEEN!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:31.target: 你不用解释！我想我一直都知道这事总有一天会发生的…再见，艾琳！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:32.source: EVEN IF HE WAS A LITTLE DRUNK, I WAS GLAD SEE HIM. THE MINUTE HE CAME IN, THE OLD FEELING BEGAN TO COME BACK.....
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:32.target: 虽然他有点醉了，见到他我很高兴。他一进来，旧时的感觉就又回来了……

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:39.source: WELL, I HEAR YOU're ENGAGED TO BRAD! CONGRATULATIONS, BABy! GLAD TO HEAR YOU'RE GETTING JUST WHAT you WANTED!
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:39.target:
我听说你和巴特订婚了！
恭喜你，宝贝！我很高兴，
知道你得到了
你想要的！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:36.source: yOU COULD HAVE FOUND OUT HOW I WAS, TONY! I'VE BEEN RIGHT HERE! WHAT ABOUT YOU? WHAT HAVE YOU BEEN DOING?
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:36.target: 我一直在这里，你应该能知道我过得怎么样，托尼！那你呢？你一直在做什么？

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:23.source: OH, TONY... TONY! yOU CAN GIVE ME SO MUCH MORE THAN HE EVER COULD- YOU CAN'T YOU SEE THAT I LOVE YOU?
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:23.target: 哦，托尼…托尼！你能给我比他多得多的东西，你看不出我爱你吗？

come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:22.source: I'M SORRY BART...I CAN'T EXPLAIN! I GUESS I ALWAYS LOVED HIM AND HE NEEDS ME! IN A WAY, YOU'LL NEVER NEED ANYBODY!
come_to_me_love.itp:8.jpg:22.target: 对不起，巴特…我无法解释！我想我一直爱他，他需要我！在某种程度上，你永远不需要任何人！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:23.source: HELLO, BABY! JUST THOUGHT I'D LOOK UP MY OLD FRIEND ..IT'S BEEN A LONG TIME... WONDERED HOW yOU WERE!
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:23.target: 你好，宝贝！我只是想来看看我的老朋友…好久不见了，想知道你怎么样了！

come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:20.source: AFTER THAT NIGHT. TONY SEEMED TO VANISH FROM THE FACE OF THE EARTH. THAT FALL. I TOOK A JOB AS A SECRETARY, AND BART WENT OFF TO COLLEGE. HE WROTE OFTEN, AND SAW HIM DURING VACA. TIONS AND ON OCCA. SIONAL WEEKENDS, WHEN HE COULD COME DONN A YEAR PASSED, AND THEN FART OF ANOTHER- AND THEN ONE NIGHT.
come_to_me_love.itp:4.jpg:20.target: 那晚之后，托尼似乎从地球上消失了。那年秋天，我找到了一份秘书的工作。巴特去上了大学。他经常写信给我。我们在假期和偶尔的周末见面，当他可以过来的时候。就这样两年过去了。有一天晚上……

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:48.source: DON'T PLAY TOUGH WITH ME, TONY! WE'RE OLD FRIENDS! FOR yOUR INFORMATION THOUGH-I'M NOT ENGAGED TO ANYBODY!
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:48.target: 别这样，托尼！我们是老朋友了！不过，我没有和任何人订婚！

come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:47.source: HE CHANGED THEN.. BECAME MORE HIS OLD SELF. WHEN HE ASKED ME FOR A DATE, I ACCEPTED. IT DIDN'T TAKE MUCH INTUITION TO SEE THAT HE WAS UNHAPPY.
come_to_me_love.itp:5.jpg:47.target: 他变了…变成了他原来的样子。当他找我约会时，我接受了。很容易就能看出，他不开心。
